## assert() function

Implementation of assert as a development help

Note - this is deliberately a global function so that minimizers remove the entire call when building for production.


<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function assert(condition: boolean, message?: string): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  condition | boolean | Condition to match, if false, throws an Error(message) |
|  message | string | Optional message, defaults to "ASSERTION failed" |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
